flawed_nl_solution:
The judge dismissed 2 cases, leaving 17 - 2 = <<17-2=18>>18 cases.
Of the remaining 18 cases, 2 / 3 * 18 = <<2/3*18=12>>12 were ruled innocent.
One ruling was delayed, so the judge ruled guilty on 18 - 12 - 1 = <<18-12-1=5>>5 cases.
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
